participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: introverted and creative, often feeling out of place but has a vivid imagination.
participant_1.background: i don't have many friends. i hate school. i am a 12 year old girl. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.

participant_2.name: Kai
participant_2.personality: calm and introspective, valuing spiritual growth and peace.
participant_2.background: i'm a buddhist. i live in alaska. i've not spoken in three months. i like meditation. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time.

content.text: Nice to see you! I like to go to the gym
